snippet.title: Gunpoint Level Editor Trailer
snippet.description:
Gunpoint will have a level editor! Here's what it's like to use. Sign up to get an e-mail when the game is out: http://gunpointgame.us2.list-manage1.com/subscribe?u=332b53efcc5be9a48a5c44ea8&id=54af0d32b7

Gunpoint is a creative stealth puzzle game that lets you rewire its levels to trick people. It'll be on Windows first, Mac later.

Twitter account: https://twitter.com/GunpointGame
Official site: http://www.gunpointgame.com/
